education.institution: National Institute of Applied Science and Technology

experience.title: Research And Development Engineer
experience.description: Engineered the backend for Doctor and Patient healthcare platforms (web/mobile) using Flask and GCP, implementing Redis caching and pagination for enhanced performance and scalability. Collaborated in building an Al document processing system with Google Gemini and LangChain, standardizing healthcare data. Developed a conversational chatbot using Flask (utilized OpenAl's GPT-4 Turbo model).

experience.title: Research And Development Intern
experience.description: Developed 2 Flask-based backend portals (Doctor and Patient Portals) helping doctors recommend treatment for patients suffering from diabetes type-2. Stored patients consent decisions on blockchain. Designed a consent-aware search engine to display only authorized patient data. All the data is stored in MongoDB.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Developed a Deep Learning CNN based model to adjust rotated scanned documents using Keras. Developed a web app using Streamlit to easily label the right deviation angle of scanned documents (manually labeling 1248 images).
